title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, May 27, 2020
description: On this day in 1937, the Golden Gate Bridge opened. The idea of the bridge was first broached in 1869 by a man who called himself the "Emperor of the United States."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1937, the Golden Gate Bridge opened. The idea of the bridge was first broached in 1869 by a man who called himself the "Emperor of the United States."
